text: A (tirpu) dinamuna kondari mukhalu (santosanto) prakasistu untayi. Marikondari mukhalu (duhkhanto) nallabadi untayi. Ika evari mukhalu nallabadi untayo varito: "Miru visvasincina taruvata satyatiraskarulu ayyaru kada? Kabatti miru satyanni tiraskarincinanduku i siksanu anubhavincandi." (Ani anabadutundi)
